displayProperties.description:
Archie found this under a chair in the Bazaar. Someone was probably angry they couldn't use it.

This item has no use and can be safely dismantled… though Archie might be sad.
displayProperties.name: Expired Ramen Coupon

displayProperties.description:
Archie found this while poking through the offices of the Lunar Complex. Whoever it belonged to would probably be saying "I was right!" right now.

This item has no use and can be safely dismantled… though Archie might be sad.
displayProperties.name: Spinfoil Hat

displayProperties.description:
Archie snagged this from Devrim's hideout while he wasn't looking. It once held something delicious, but the contents have spilled out.

This item has no use and can be safely dismantled… though Archie might be sad.
displayProperties.name: Devrim's Favorite Mug

displayProperties.description:
Archie found this sitting next to a Wizard's crown while exploring around the Hellmouth. He thought it was cool.

This item has no use and can be safely dismantled… though Archie might be sad.
displayProperties.name: A Cool Rock

displayProperties.description:
Archie picked this up in the Dreaming City—or at least what looked like the Dreaming City. Some weird stuff happened afterward, but Archie has just been gnawing on it since.

This item has no use and can be safely dismantled… though Archie might be sad.
displayProperties.name: Ahamkara Bone

displayProperties.description:
Archie went through a ton of tokens to get this from the Thrilladrome. He's not sure how it exists, but we don't need to worry about that.

This item has no use and can be safely dismantled… though Archie might be sad.
displayProperties.name: Archie Plush Toy

displayProperties.description:
A rare curio obtained from "Salvation's Edge."

When inserted into a Shaped or Enhanced weapon, this Memento will grant the weapon additional vanity options.

You may store only three of these Mementos at a time.
displayProperties.name: Monolithic Memento

displayProperties.description:
A rare curio obtained from Solstice.

When inserted into a Shaped or Enhanced weapon, this Memento will grant the weapon additional vanity options.

You may store only three of these Mementos at a time.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Memento

displayProperties.description: Targets damaged by Arcane Needle emit a suspending detonation when defeated, and landing multiple Arcane Needles on the same target immediately triggers a larger, more powerful detonation. Defeating suspended targets grants melee energy. Your Arcane Needles are strong against [Shield-Piercing]Barrier Champions.
displayProperties.name: Stylostixis

displayProperties.description: Gain an additional Frenzied Blade charge. Frenzied Blade and Flechette Storm briefly increase their damage with each strike. Pulses from your Banner of War return melee energy based on the number of allies healed.
displayProperties.name: Wish-Dragon's Talons

displayProperties.description: Your Threaded Specter has increased duration and durability, and damaging it releases additional Threadlings. While near your Threaded Specter, you do not appear on radar.
displayProperties.name: Double Down

displayProperties.description: Activating Ascension or Tempest Strike throws bouncing explosives at nearby targets that jolt and damage them. Jolting nearby targets grants you damage resistance.
displayProperties.name: The Gift of Certainty

displayProperties.description: Healing grenades spawn a Restorative Turret. Healing allies occasionally spawns an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.description: Weapon precision hits or final blows have a chance to load a Kinetic Exodus rocket. Activating your class ability fires loaded Exodus rockets. Damaging targets with Exodus rockets temporarily increases the damage you deal with all other rockets.

displayProperties.description: Pick up Orbs of Power or land precision hits to charge this weapon's Super bar. Once full, [Alternate Weapon Action]  to fire Golden Gun shots.
displayProperties.name: Cayde's Retribution

displayProperties.description: Dealing sustained damage with this weapon spawns Threadlings at your target's location.
displayProperties.name: Unwound

displayProperties.description: Fires a beam of Kinetic light, dealing massive bonus damage to shields.
displayProperties.name: Paracausal Beam

displayProperties.description: Every seventh bullet from this weapon ricochets to nearby targets.
displayProperties.name: The Right Choice

displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon cure you and increase reload speed; reloading after final blows cures nearby allies.
displayProperties.name: Redemption

displayProperties.description:
Final blows with this weapon grant stacks of Gathering Light, improving guard stats and lunge range.
Stowing this weapon consumes all stacks, granting melee, grenade, and class ability energy.
displayProperties.name: Gathering Light

displayProperties.description: Powered heavy attacks cause nearby Sword-wielders to emit tracking missiles with every attack.
displayProperties.name: Wolfpack Rounds

displayProperties.description: Powered heavy attacks charge the wielder, enabling them to resist Arc damage and chain lightning to nearby targets.
displayProperties.name: Arc Conductor

displayProperties.description: Rapid final blows create a lightning storm at the target's location.
displayProperties.name: Stormbringer

displayProperties.description:
Powered heavy attacks mark nearby targets, causing them to explode upon death.
Striking marked targets with a Light attack detonates them.
displayProperties.name: Sacred Flame

displayProperties.description: Every five hits attach a delayed Solar explosive, scorching your target.
displayProperties.name: The Perfect Fifth

displayProperties.description: Powered heavy attacks emit projectiles that detonate with a delayed Void blast.
displayProperties.name: Unplanned Reprieve

displayProperties.description: Defeated targets drop insectoid robots that chase and explode close to other targets.
displayProperties.name: Insectoid Robot Grenades

displayProperties.description:
Rapid final blows cause targets to explode into a pool of radiolarian fluid.

Hip firing launches multiple projectiles at once in a slower moving spread pattern. Projectiles detonate on impact.
displayProperties.name: Fanatical Lance

displayProperties.description: This weapon gains passive bonuses to target acquisition, aim down sight speed, and flinch resistance. The bonus increases when this weapon's super mode is active.
displayProperties.name: Sharpshooter

displayProperties.description: Threadling damage increases this weapon's damage.
displayProperties.name: Spindle

displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon grant Super energy. This weapon gains bonus damage once your Super expires.
displayProperties.name: Paracausal Imbuement

displayProperties.description: Collecting Orbs of Power strengthens this weapon's next several ricochet shots, providing more damage and more bounces between targets.
displayProperties.name: Eyes Up, Guardian

displayProperties.description:
When you deal damage with this weapon, it gains increased handling, takes reduced flinch, and movement speed is increased for a short time.

When you are at reduced health, this weapon deals additional damage.
displayProperties.name: Inverse Relationship

displayProperties.description:
This weapon collects less ammo. Final blows with this weapon accelerate Light and Darkness mastery.
Deals increased damage while Transcendent; defeating targets lengthens Transcendence.
displayProperties.name: Transcendent Duelist

displayProperties.description:
[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy spin attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.
displayProperties.name: Vortex Frame

displayProperties.description:
[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy projectile attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.
displayProperties.name: Caster Frame

displayProperties.description:
Heavy attack deploys a shockwave uppercut and launches the user into the air.

An immediate follow up swing after the uppercut deploys a homing strike that aggressively seeks a target.
displayProperties.name: Wave Sword Frame

displayProperties.description:
Fast movement.
[Heavy Attack]  : Dash attack.
displayProperties.name: Lightweight Frame

displayProperties.description:
Powerful, heavy swings.
[Heavy Attack]  : Slam.
displayProperties.name: Aggressive Frame
